messages.subject: Re: Digest Number 81/so long, farewell...
messages.msgSnippet: I have been lurking here for a few weeks (seems like a few months) trying to get caught up enough to join the conversations. It will never happen. I am
messages.messageBody:
I have been lurking here for a few weeks (seems like a few months)
trying to get caught up enough to join the conversations. It will never
happen. I am learning to unschool 5 kids ages 2-7. It is still a new
concept to me and I was very excited about the idea of learning from
more experienced unschoolers. Most of what I read on here is valuable
but I just can't keep up, I have been reading for over an hour this
morning (and did the same yesterday) and I am still not caught up from
the weekend. The kids will be up soon. Before I unsub from this great
but very overwhelmingly large list I would like to see if there are
folks who are similarly minded and situated who may be interested in a
smaller, more intimate, manageable list. Specifically: Christian,
unschooler, attachment parenting(ish), into health and natural
alternatives to the chemical filled world, not into the materialistic
commercialism that surrounds us. If this sounds somewhat like you, e
mail me . Starfreedom@... I am sorry to leave this list but I
need to get more specific with the small amount of time I have. Thank
you. Mary in Idaho
